body_html: I've just tested this issue and noticed the following: while the "We want to suggest another conference!" button works absolutely great for students on their team's page here /teams/NNN, it doesn't work at all for the admins in the orga space: /orga/teams/NNN. I think we should either make it work or delete it from there.

body: I've just tested this issue and noticed the following: while the "We want to suggest another conference!" button works absolutely great for students on their team's page here `/teams/NNN`, it doesn't work at all for the admins in the orga space: `/orga/teams/NNN`. I think we should either make it work or delete it from there.
